documents.document: Beer league hockey update. I returned from missing 2 games with a lower body injury. We lost 4-2. Got a helper. #contributing #always
It my father's 80th birthday today. Happy Birthday Theo! You are truly the best!!
Now following @POTUS. Here we go.
I think I broke all of my New Years resolutions within the first 2 hours of the start of the year.
Houston - we have a problem. https://t.co/LLd93VtA9x
Was flying in this thing earlier today. Great ride. https://t.co/EzSpItGjSY
At Tsawwassen Mills mall. This place is huge. I feel like I just walked 18 holes.
"@HuffPostCanada: Toronto luxury home sales soar almost 100% in a year https://t.co/G5CoN3QHYI https://t.co/HDvNmKSAWu" Ya.The ex YVR buyer.
Currently getting reflexologized.
Correction: It does NOT feel like spring out there. If you don't like the weather wait 10 minutes.
B.C. real estate data show sharp decline in foreign investment after tax https://t.co/DZkW9AeHw4 Brutal news. Harsh stats.
A Yaletown salted sidewalk. No ice. No snow. That's messed up. https://t.co/w0JlEINGnw
OK 2017. Look out. I'm serious.
Heading to Big Feet for an hour and a half major league rub down.
I actually noticed a real difference in the amount of daylight we got today. Seems much longer than just 7 days ago. #RightDirection
I'm having a hard time believing that it's December 30th, 2017. I remember the millenium like it was yesterday. Time is flying.
En route to see @KaseyMicaela @Kendall_Titch and @J_Titchener. Good times ahead.
Reflecting on the death of George Michael I remember when the video for Freedom came out. It had all the top models of the era #straight
It's Christmas Eve day.
The shortest day of the year is almost over. From here on in we gain a minute of daylight per day. This is a good thing for many. Me too!
Very happy with my haircut. If you want the same magnificent results go see Nancy at Black to Blonde in Kits.
Currently getting my ears lowered.
Beer League update. Playing later tonight. Same team where we tallied up between us 121 PIMs in a 39 minute game. I'm prepared. #tinfoil
Beer League hockey update. Down 3 zip last night. Ended up tying it up at 3. Lost 4-3 with 1:20 to go. #FirstWorldProblems
I feel like poutine right now.
Big shout out to my mother. She's celebrating the completion of 78 years of existence on this planet tomorrow. I adore her. #KeepGoing
Beer league game update. Played last night. We were down 4-1. Climbed back to 4-3 but lost. I had a goal and a helper. #McDavid
The new https://t.co/oiQhFU8aqW is out. Compliments are welcomed. Insults...not so welcomed.
I wonder what people in Alberta, Sakatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, N.S., N.B., P.E.I., NFLD and Labrador think of our 'snow storm'.
Big snow, little snow. Little snow, big snow. #Snowgate
Not a snowflake to be seen as of yet. #BCStorm2016
The Yukon has tremendous potential.
Flew back from the Yukon tonight. The airport is so simple. Went through Gate 1. Flight left 15 minutes early. Great people at Air North!
Very excited to head to the Yukon tonight. Tomorrow I will be attending the swearing in of the new Premier @klondike_silver #InGoodHands
Cool. https://t.co/Ra1nQaljSJ
Beer league game update. We beat The Outlaws 4-2. I had to hit the showers early with a game misconduct. #Canadian #OhWell
Under 10 days until the launch of the new https://t.co/oiQhFU8aqW. I'm half excited and half nervous.
"@Scorpio_F6: #Scorpio spread joy and laughter wherever they go." As a Scorpio I have to whole heartedly agree.
Where I was this past weekend. A winter wonderland. #BirkenheadLake https://t.co/NHIdilV2hO
Beer league hockey game update. Quite the tilt last night. We won 6-2. There was also 121 PIMs. Shout out to Nick for representing.
It's like hurricane winds out there.
She's a windy one out there.
"@Cowboycerrone: Hey @arielhelwani https://t.co/tkQtAvg39E". What did the other guy look like?
That's it for daylight today? Really? Now dark until tomorrow morning? C'mon. It's only 4:40pm. #harsh
"@Horocasts: #Scorpio can't deal with someone that never show up on time or make promises they can't keep." I have to agree on this one.
"@Lifeldeas: I can officially say that Â are definitely an Extremist. https://t.co/nmyHMw7I1N" That doesn't look too hard.
Big shout out to @klondike_silver on being the newly elected Premier of the Yukon. Great guy. He will not disappoint. Congratulations!!
The supposed super moon. #DoesntSeemThatSuperToMe https://t.co/ARgB8Yyhov
Others went to war so that I didn't have to. Thank you.
Trump protesters just rolled by. https://t.co/arP5EGKNZb
Though shalt not panic.
Hillary is going to bed?
Today was the most amount of daylight we are going to see for months. #hack
When is last call tonight? #DST
There is going to be a new President in the United States on Tuesday.
Hard to believe that we are about to lose an hour of daylight this weekend. Do we have an hour to lose? It's dark enough already.
The baseball season ends tonight. Isn't it a summer sport? And isn't it November?
Beer league game tonight. Lost 4-2. We had a great start to the season. Now on a skid. #Canucks
Is Movember still a thing?
It's November. Good luck to all this month.
Wanted to have a 30 minute nap. It turned into over 2 hours. Woke up groggy. Then saw Wonder Woman and a dinosaur together. #Halloween
Beer league hockey league update. Had a game last night. 10pm start. Should have had 2 goals and 3 assists. Ended up with 0 points. L 4-1.
It feels like a Friday to me.
Watching the Canucks game in Punjabi. It's kind of interesting. It's like being in a foreign country. #CBC #HNIC
The fur protesters just wrapping up another protest. Ridiculous. And they are all wearing leather shoes. https://t.co/XtHPg3ut31
I'm at @TheKeg. Absolutely delicious prime rib is being consumed by me. Thank you @TheKeg !!
"@Fact: Breathing the air in Beijing has the same health risks as smoking 21 cigarettes a day." Lovely.
Beer league game update. Up 3-1, then down 4-3, then came back and won 5-4. We are 4-1 after 5 games. #TheShow #BecauseItsTheCup
"@NEWS1130: BREAKING: Wind warning is ended for Metro Vancouver #BCStorm : https://t.co/WrmDPBmQip" That was the tail end of a typhoon?
Heading out in the #BCStorm to go play beer league hockey. #TeamPlaya #brave #fearless
The fur protesters are back at it. And now they have duck calling whistles. All during the #BCstorm. Clowns. https://t.co/4CU1emY1x4
Why did Hillary delete 33,000 emails after being subpoena'd? I would kinda like an answer to that one. What was she hiding?
"@GlobalBC: Drinking and starving is the new trend among Canadian undergrads. https://t.co/LzwCCu6GVe" So glad that I'm an overgrad.
"@NEWS1130: Samsung Note 7 recall to cost at least $5.3 billion https://t.co/Wau9vRzq1V" Still lovin' my BlackBerry.
I put together a land assembly tonight. 4 houses in a row. Already have the Buyer. This is the next level of real estate.
The calm before the storm. Literally.
"@Fact: People tend to confuse being mean with being honest." Agreed.
It was just 10:10 on 10/10.
Turkey coma.
"@WhatTheFFacts: In French, a walkie-talkie is called a talkie-walkie." Everything is backwards there.
"@WhatTheFFacts: Alaska was sold to the United States for about 2 cents an acre." Too expensive.
"@Fact: Is Your Cat Depressed? 9 Signs... https://t.co/E7kPjTAStA" I'll be honest with you...I'm not a big fan of cats....at all. Period.
Thank you @BlueJays for relieving stress tonight. By doing that you will be creating a whole lot more stress in the coming days. Good luck
Who wants to be a hero? #Jays
On this day in 1994 I moved here from Toronto. Happy Moving Anniversary to me. #Oct2
Beer League game result. We won our 4th game. 3 and 1 now. First place. #ItsEarly
"@ScanBC: #Delta crews are on scene with a Cessna that crashed at the end of the runway at Bounday Bay Airport. #CZBB" Rough start. #PullUp
Signed up a new listing tonight. 1600 sq ft 1/2 duplex in Kits north of 4th. In the quiet part. 3100 block. Shows well. 2.298M. Call me!
Horses in the bike lane. Is that a violation? #YaletownProblems https://t.co/djWKrl3LSM
Great photo shoot today. New pics coming for my soon-to-be released new website. Thank you @kevinclarkphoto. Great job!
Beer League game result. We were up 2-0. Then down 5-2. Then we tied it up 5-5. OT solved nothing. Off to a shootout. We won. 6-5.
Beer league game today at 3pm. Attendance expected - 0.
Canada's Landlords have arrived. Great. #RoyalsVisitCanada
"@BradyTrett: Slo-mo of MacKinnon's hands on the OT winner. No words. https://t.co/JDdAWL9pQK" Beautiful.
"@Fact: People with smartphones unlock their phone around 110 times each day." Absolutely ridiculous. #ThatsProbablyMyAverage #yikes
"@Quote_Soup: Love conquers all." You need some cash too...
"@Quote_Soup: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. - Mike Murdoch" Habits.
Was crusin' beside a Delorean today. Quite the rig. #BackToTheFuture https://t.co/XX0Os8RWmy
New website coming soon. New photos coming soon. Stay tuned.
